p: Sejvar et al. found that the incidence of GBS increased with age [ 13]. However, we did not observe similar trends in the LAC population, with the GBS IR exhibiting different age-specific patterns across settings. The higher burden of GBS among males reported in this review was consistent with Sejvar et al., with an estimated relative risk for males of 1.78 (95% CI 1.36â€“2.33) [ 13].
